turkish_example_sentence: Siz çocuklarla parkta oynamasanız bile, onlarla kaliteli sohbet edersiniz.
english_example_sentence: Even if you don't play with the children in the park, you will have quality conversations with them.
russian_example_sentence: Даже если вы не будете играть с детьми в парке, вы будете вести с ними качественные беседы.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz çocuklarla parkta ______ bile, onlarla kaliteli sohbet edersiniz.
